articles.author: Kyle Orland
articles.title: Switch emulator Ryujinx shuts down development after “contact by Nintendo” - Ars Technica
articles.description: GitHub removal comes months after a Nintendo lawsuit took down the Yuzu emulator.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ These copyrighted Switch games shown on Ryujinx's former GitHub page probably didn't curry any favor with Nintendo.
34
Popular open source Nintendo Switch emulator Ryujinx has been removed… [+3109 chars]
